messages.subject: Rue and Ren
messages.msgSnippet: Rue being with Jon is not quite as strange as you might think.... Y know, I always wondered just how the heck a sweetie like Rue ended up with a devil like
messages.messageBody:
"Rue being with Jon is not quite as strange as you might think...."

Y'know, I always wondered just how the heck a sweetie like Rue ended
up with a devil like Jon (a fun devil, btw)...now we know the truth.
Hmmm.....
Maybe I should resign the "evil twin" label after all.

Ren

messages.subject: RE: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Rue and Ren
messages.msgSnippet: ... Kathryn **I could retaliate against these unfounded accusations, but I m much too sweet .  ~Rue [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
messages.messageBody:
>>Rue being with Jon is not quite as strange as you might think....
Kathryn


**I could retaliate against these unfounded accusations, but I'm much too
sweet <G>. ~Rue

messages.subject: Re: Rue and Ren
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 12/16/2005 1:04:00 AM Eastern Standard Time, unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes: -pam -  easily sidetracked today  Yeah, and she
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 12/16/2005 1:04:00 AM Eastern Standard Time,
unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com writes:

"-pam - easily sidetracked today <G>"

Yeah, and she called me Rue...:)
which I totally don't mind, since Rue is much sweeter than I am.



***********************
You might think so, but as you get to know her, you see she has an evil
streak.

Rue being with Jon is not quite as strange as you might think....
Kathryn
